message.content:
cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.LG 

Reasoning: The paper deals with Age of Information (AoI) in networked systems, which is a topic related to networked control systems and information theory. The focus on minimizing the tail of the AoI distribution and the use of upper bounds suggest a statistical and optimization approach, which is relevant to machine learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also involves information theory and communication, which are relevant to cs.IT (Information Theory). The use of optimization techniques and heuristics suggests relevance to cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
